response.overview: Victoria (23) is a renowned ballet dancer about to premiere a contemporary work with Lola (20), her new partner who has just auditioned. However, her rehearsals will be affected by Ornella (23), a dancer who has been with the company for a long time without being considered for a leading role. Guided by envy, Ornella injures Lola's leg, making her unable to dance.
response.title: La Violeta Marchita
